detail_desc: Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with long raglan sleeves, ventilating holes under the arms, seams at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.

Sports top in sturdy jersey with a stand-up collar and mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Zip down the front, pleated sections on the sleeves, shoulders and chest and zipped side pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.

Sports trousers with reflective details, an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a concealed zip and tapered legs.

Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Lightly padded anorak in windproof and water-resistant functional fabric with reflective details. Lined hood, stand-up collar, wind flap with hook-and-loop fasteners and a zip at the top. Zipped Kangaroo pocket and adjustable tabs at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Lined hood with a peak and an elastic drawstring front and back. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastener and a zipped lift pass pocket on one sleeve. Snow flap with reinforced elastication and press-studs at the waist, an adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.

Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.

Zip and wind flap with a hook-and-loop fastening at the front, handwarmer pockets and patch pockets with a flap and hook-and-loop fastening. Adjustable tab with a hook-and-loop fastening at the cuffs and sides and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar and fleece-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and narrow elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft fleece inside.

Sports hoodie in sturdy jersey with a print motif, high collar and mesh-lined, drawstring hood. Mesh-lined kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves with seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Softshell popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Lined hood and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening at the top. Diagonal, zipped front pockets, an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.

Sports jacket in jersey with a zip down the front and a lined hood with elastic drawstrings. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, zipped chest pockets with taped details and welt side pockets. Elastication at the back of the hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports trousers in heavy jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Ventilated mesh section at the crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.

Track jacket in padded nylon with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the cuffs. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.

Sports gilet in padded nylon. Hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication around the armholes. The gilet has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.

Trousers in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with reinforced sections. Regular waist with belt loops, a zip fly and button and straight legs. Front pockets, a back pocket and leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud.
Sports jacket in thermal faux shearling with nylon sections. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Elasticated trims around the cuffs and hem.

Jacket in jersey made from a polyester and cotton blend with a print motif on the chest. Mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with taped details and ribbed cuffs. Mesh-lined side pockets with a concealed zip. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Track jacket in padded nylon with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the cuffs. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.

Sports trousers in softly draping jersey with grosgrain side stripes. Elasticated, drawstring waist, welt side pockets and cuffed hems. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique. Slightly shorter legs that are slim-fitting at the thighs and knees and taper at the hems for a flattering silhouette.
